ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 1 MXU x 256x256 systolic array x 2 (MAC) = 131,072 INT8 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.note: TPU v1 ONLY supports INT8. No floating point support. Largest systolic array (256x256) in TPU family.

theoretical_peaks_notes: 92 TOPS INT8 = 131,072 ops/clock x 700 MHz. ISCA 2017 paper confirms 92 TeraOps/s.
notes: Original Google TPU (ISCA 2017). Single 256x256 systolic array (65,536 MACs). 28nm process. INT8 ONLY (no floating point). 8GB DDR3 at 34 GB/s. Inference-only accelerator. 28-40W TDP. PCIe Gen3 x16.
